parameters.name: DBInstanceType
parameters.description:
The category of the instance. Valid values:

*   **replicate**: the standalone or replica set instance
*   **sharding**: the sharded cluster instance

Default value: **replicate**.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. The value must be a positive integer that does not exceed the maximum value of the Integer parameter. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: **30**, **50**, and **100**.

>  Default value: **30**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance. You can call the [DescribeDBInstanceAttribute](~~62010~~) operation to query the region ID of the instance.
